function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective governance models for disaster response","Impact":"Ineffective disaster response and management","Mitigation":"Research and analyze the most effective governance models for disaster response","Technologies":"Data analysis, open data platforms, automatic reasoning","People":"City leaders, administrators, experts","Owner":"Academic and research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate utilization of urban insights for governance","Impact":"Inefficient urban governance and decision-making","Mitigation":"Develop a framework for translating urban insights into effective governance strategies","Technologies":"Linked open data platforms, automatic reasoning, smart learning systems","People":"Urban governance authorities, data analysts, city planners","Owner":"Urban governance authorities, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Insufficient actionable open data and citizen integration","Impact":"Lack of citizen engagement and ineffective use of data","Mitigation":"Collaborate with citizens to identify actionable open data, form interdisciplinary teams, and integrate citizens' inputs into governance processes","Technologies":"Open data platforms, citizen engagement platforms, interdisciplinary collaboration tools","People":"Citizens, interdisciplinary teams, government officials","Owner":"Urban governance authorities, citizen groups"}]}
